summary: Defines data models and a backend implementation that emulate AWS Config service resources such as configuration recorders, delivery channels, rules, aggregators, conformance packs, and retention settings. Includes validation, serialization, and pagination logic to support creation, update, deletion, and querying of these resources within the Moto mock framework.
business_intent: Enable developers and test suites to simulate AWS Config functionality without contacting real AWS endpoints, facilitating automated testing, local development, and CI pipelines that rely on Config APIs.
